job_description: Google Inc. is seeking a Technical Database Engineer to design, maintain, and optimize database systems. You will ensure data reliability, availability, and performance for our organization's applications and services.
job_responsibility: As a Technical Database Engineer, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including software development, system administration, and data analysis, to ensure that our database systems meet business and technical requirements. Effective communication and gathering feedback from team members are key skills for this role.
educational_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
experiences: 3-5 years of experience in database engineering.
